topic.title: Preface
topic.para: The nature of publishing has changed so much over the last twenty years that anybody can be a publisher these days. Now you can reach a world-wide audience by putting a few HTML pages up on your website. Or you can use desktop publishing software to produce beautifully typeset material that can be printed on demand or downloaded to a printer anywhere in the world. With DocBook, you can publish both ways from the same source material.
